title: Oliver Wilson (rugby league)
text:
Oliver Wilson (born 22 March 2000) is a professional <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who plays as a for the <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford Bulls</a> in the <a href="RFL%20Championship">RFL Championship</a>, on loan from the <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield Giants</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Super%20League">Betfred Super League</a>. 
He has previously played for <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford</a> in <a href="League%201%20%28rugby%20league%29">League 1</a> and the <a href="2019%20RFL%20Championship">Championship</a>, and spent time on loan from <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield</a> at <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a> in the <a href="2020%20RFL%20Championship">Championship</a>.
Playing career.
Bradford Bulls.
Between 2018 and 2019 he played for the <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford Bulls</a>.
Huddersfield Giants.
Wilson has spent time on loan from <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield</a> at <a href="Halifax%20R.L.F.C.">Halifax</a> in the <a href="Betfred%20Championship">Betfred Championship</a>.
In 2019 he made his <a href="Super%20League">Super League</a> début for <a href="Huddersfield%20Giants">Huddersfield</a> against the <a href="Salford%20Red%20Devils">Salford Red Devils</a>.
Bradford Bulls (loan).
On 26 May 2021 it was reported that he had signed for the <a href="Bradford%20Bulls">Bradford Bulls</a> in the <a href="RFL%20Championship">RFL Championship</a> on loan.
